communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

I hope this request finds you in good spirits. I request that a copy of the following documents [or documents containing the following information] be provided to me that pertains to Menard Correctional Center:  

* Number of inmates in healthcare unit (monthly and yearly).
* Number and type of licensed medical personnel (temporary, contract, and permanent) working at the facility more than one day per year.
* Number of inmate deaths (monthly and yearly).
* Cause of inmate deaths (description and total per type, monthly and yearly).
* Number of inmate autopsies performed (monthly and yearly).
* Method of "disposal" of inmate remains (i.e., burial, cremation).
* Number of inmates who were prescribed psychotropic medications (monthly and yearly).
* Number of inmates who saw a licensed mental health professional (monthly and yearly).
* List of required qualifications and training for inmate "counselor" positions (i.e., degree type, experience, training, license).
* Number of staff who are "counselors" for inmates (monthly, yearly).
* Number of "counselors" who remain in that position for over six months.

Please provide the records requested above for June 2023 to June 2024. 

In the event that there are fees, please inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request be filled electronically to avoid burden and costs.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Laurel King Russell

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

I hope this request finds you in good spirits. I request that a copy of the following documents [or documents containing the following information] be provided to me that pertains to Menard Correctional Center:  

* Number of adult family/friend visitors per month and year for the time frame of June 2023 to June 2024.
* Number of visitor vehicle searches conducted on-site per month and year.
* Number of visitors whose visits were permanently restricted, by month of final determination by AWO.
* Number of visitors whose visits were temporarily restricted, and total length of restriction.
* Number of visitors who were issued a "warning" regarding their visitation privileges, by month and year.
* Number of video visits canceled by the facility (month and year).
* How funds from visits canceled by the facility were used, including amounts and reason for use.

Please provide the records requested above for June 2023 to June 2024. 

In the event that there are fees, please inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request be filled electronically to avoid burden and costs.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Laurel King Russell

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

I hope this request finds you in good spirits. I request that a copy of the following documents [or documents containing the following information] be provided to me that pertains to Menard Correctional Center:  

* Logs of all inmate-filed grievances at Menard CC from June 2023 to June 2024.
* Category of each grievance filed.
* Outcome of each grievance filed, including whether grievances were dismissed, founded, and/or escalated.
* Length of time founded (valid) grievances were pending. 

Please provide the records requested above for June 2023 to June 2024. 

In the event that there are fees, please inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request be filled electronically to avoid burden and costs.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Laurel King Russell

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

I hope this request finds you in good spirits. I request that a copy of the following documents [or documents containing the following information] be provided to me that pertains to Menard Correctional Center:  

* Number of inmates placed in solitary confinement (aka: isolation, segregation, RH, restrictive housing) monthly and yearly.
* Reasons for inmates placed in solitary confinement and percentage of each reason (aggregate, monthly, and yearly).
* Total length of time inmates are in solitary confinement (both individual and aggregate, average).
* Type of release from solitary confinement (i.e., parole, discharge, death).

Please provide the records requested above for June 2023 to June 2024. 

In the event that there are fees, please inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request be filled electronically to avoid burden and costs.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Laurel King Russell

title: Menard Corr - metal detector and pat-down process

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Menard Corr - metal detector and pat-down process
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

I hope this request finds you in good spirits. I request that a copy of the following documents [or documents containing the following information] be provided to me that pertains to Menard Correctional Center:  

* Number of staff searched and "patted down" daily and monthly (incl. wardens, COs, contractors, medical, mental health, temporary employees).
* Last "pass" inspection of facility metal detector (front gatehouse), along with date of inspection and name/title of inspector.
* Number of staff found with contraband during entry/exit of facility, daily and monthly.

Please provide the records requested above for June 2023 to June 2024. 

In the event that there are fees, please inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request be filled electronically.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Laurel King Russell

title: Menard Corr - phone and email directory

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Menard Corr - phone and email directory
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

I hope this request finds you in good spirits. I request that a copy of the following documents [or documents containing the following information] be provided to me that pertains to Menard (parent facility and NRC) Correctional Center:  

* Telephone directory of all current Menard Correctional Center employees and staff.
* Email directory of all current Menard Correctional Center employees and staff.
* Comprehensive list of current phone numbers, extensions, and corresponding names. If applicable, please include position titles of each extension. For example, extension 2300 is Warden (position title) and directs the caller to Jamie Knox (name) office administrator.

In the event that there are fees, please inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request be filled electronically.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Laurel King Russell
